metadata.title: CVE-2019-18810 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A memory leak in the komeda_wb_connector_add() function indrivers/gpu/drm/arm/display/komeda/komeda_wb_connector.c in the Linuxkernel before 5.3.8 allows attackers to cause a denial of service (memoryconsumption) by triggering drm_writeback_connector_init() failures, akaCID-a0ecd6fdbf5d.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
